[Chat commands] World talk : /w, /world, /Fucking, /In January, /World, /World loudspeaker channels dialog : /c, /channel, /ㅊ, /Chapman, /Channel, /Channel loudspeaker area dialog : /s, /space, /That, /, /Local party conversation : /p, /party, /ㅔ, /Wave, /Party Guild dialog : /g, /guild, /Heh, /Gil, /Guild whisper : /r, /It shall come to pass, /Ear, /Ear horse, /A whisper, /whisper - [How do I use a whisper] /Whisper character names say party invites : /Party invitation, /partyinvite, /pinvite - [Party invites how to use] /Party invites character names party withdrawal : /Party opt-out, /partyleave, /pleave Guild invite : /Guild invite /guildinvite, /ginvite - [How do I use the Guild invite] /Guild invite character names Mei view search : /Search, /search - [How do I use the view search mate] /To move the channel search queries : /Shift channels - [How to move the channel] /The numbers help shift channels : /h, /help, /? [Debug chat command] /Kill to come : npcEliminates all /Profession (code) : The former as a career /Level (lv), /level (lv) : Change the level /Meredith small empty : Megan cow is set to 0. /Megan Barrett zeroing : Megan Barrett is set to 0,. /High speed flight or /FastGlide : Learn the quick slot high-flying skill.

[Debug shortcut keys] ~ : toggle debug mode L CTRL + A : World map and found all the map mode L CTRL + W : open Trigger Editor L CTRL + F : toggle wire frame L CTRL + R : toggle The invincible L CTRL + D : toggle DPSMeasurement window L CTRL + G : toggle visual Tracker L CTRL + I : toggle Generates an item window L CTRL + N : toggle NPC Produce window L CTRL + M : toggle Go to the map window L CTRL + B : toggle Quest the debug window L CTRL + P : toggle perfomence dialog L CTRL + T : toggle sceenshot scene L CTRL + Z : toggle Server stress testing (map load) L CTRL + U : Step by step UIHide L CTRL + C : NPC U.s. recognition mode On/Off L CTRL + X : Eddie professional effects applied/Disable window L CTRL + H : Movement speed increase L CTRL + F4: Shoot the Dragon camera mode L CTRL + F5: Read Camera value [./data/xml/table/TestCamerValue.xml] L CTRL + F6: Camera mode change (1:PVP, 2:2D, 3:TPS, 4:FPS, 5:RPG, 6:console, 7:Existing) L Ctrl + Shift + G : The Guide calls the debug dialog L Ctrl + Delete : Inn Chan Tran Simulator dialog call [Performance testing, the debug keyboard shortcuts] W : increase swoosh text effect index L CTRL + L : GI L CTRL + F1 : toggle dialog center L CTRL + F3 : shadowOptionLevel L CTRL + F6 : toggle shadow Cube L CTRL + F7 : toggle show proxy L CTRL + F8 : toggle lost device L CTRL + F9 : toggle UIHide (unloadswf) L CTRL + F10 : check renderstate L CTRL + F11 : log dialog L CTRL + F12 : toggle use instancing L CTRL + Insert : toggle ui hidesetting [Debug chat command] /Kill to come : npcEliminates all /Guild initialization : The Guild did not have the name am /Guild (Guild name) : The Guild name creation /Profession (code) : The former as a career /Level (lv), /level (lv) : Change the level /Equipment (item rating) (item type), /equip (Item rating) (item types) : Wear a sequence from the low ratings (0), high grade sequence from the wear (7), only wear this rating (1 ~ 6), If you select the type of item types matching items first. However, the item does not exist in General when you specify a value of u.s. global items worn, always wear a regular global items - 1: General global item, 2: General global items 2, 3: The boss of the global item, 4: Boss drop-unique item /Logon triggers /Triggers, log off /Time event (eventID) : Event ID does not exist, the all-time event rod, event ID 11, 2003, 10,000 so separated by commas /Merle (m), /money (m), /meso (m) : show me the money! /resetmoney (m), /resetmeso (m) : Medley entered Thoreau initialization /coin : Intermediate goods Add /dungeonkey : Enter the Dungeon entry key, initialized with the value /Ben freed (tab) : ex) /Ben empty equipment (tab: Equipment, skills, construction, etc.) /clearinven (tab) : ex) /clearinven etc (tab: equip, skill, install, etc) /Discard (Bentab) : ex) /Ben abandon equipment (tab: Equipment, skills, construction, etc.) /dropinven (tab) : ex) /dropinven etc (tab: equip, skill, install, etc) /Party invitation (character names) : The character party invitation requests. /Channel (ch) : /exp (exp), /Experience (exp) : /sp : sp Referred to as consumed/Do not consume /ep : ep Referred to as consumed/Do not consume /Camera : /The land expired : I forced the contract period expires, a wholly-owned real estate. /Expiration (the landsaleGroup) (roomNumber) : Specify the current map saleGroupThe specified roomNumberThe expiration of the contract period the House of. (room NumberThe UI Applies only to, other apartment house is 0) /Extend the land : I own a real estate contract term extended by force. (Extension constant.xmlIn the settings) /Home (fieldSN) (salableID) : Go to the home to the field /The grounds for a contract (fieldSN) (salableID) : The grounds for a field when the agreement (contract) /Made the script time pass : Made in the script, do not check paid familiarity. /Character (worldid) : /uidev : uiDevelopment versions ON/OFF(Cash shop) /resetugcshop : reset ugcshop /maptest : toggle Server stress testing (map load) /setpvpteam (Team number) : pvpFor the sake of testing pvpThe team (it's a different team set) /stat 1(Turn on) or 0(Off): PC And NPCStats show, NPCThe NPC Name the view options to turn on. /salemarket : Market changes the State of a pending item all sales /removebuff (Traditional effects code KE) : Buff off /resetskillcooltime or /Cool time reset : Skill cooldown initialization /Cool time ignored or 0 (Off): Skill cooldown does not apply. /setstat (hp/sp/ep) (value): Resource to the specified values. /autorecovery (hp/sp/ep): Turning off the natural recovery of resources. /setservertime <yyyyMMDDhhmmss> [<servertype>...] : Server time (month date minutes seconds) - Server type (all,game,dungeon,login) /resetservertime [<servertype>...]: Initialized to the current time of the server time /addservertime <minute> [<servertype>...]: Server time ( + XMin.) /Experience the off- : Inability to acquire experience /Come experience : Acquire experience /goto (Character names) : Navigate to the location of the character. /setmaxstat (stat) (value) : Certain stat(hp,sp,ep,msp,str,dex,intm,luk, pap,map,asp,atp,cap,cad,ndd,par,mar,evp,car)To the specified value Change the value of the /resetmaxstat all : Revert to the default value to all stats. /resetmaxstat (stat) : Revert to the default value for a specific stat. /setadminlevel (Numbers only) : Adjust the number of levels /Portal (target field) (target portalID) (Keep the time Portal) (PortalAssetName) /Massive change (field) (Pax max) (off) (openValue) (Open the minimum number) (maximum) /Massive show (field) /Channel scale change (ID) (Persons Max.) /Channel scale view (ID) /High speed flight or /FastGlide : Learn the quick slot high-flying skill. /setMusicMastery (value) : Playing as the corresponding value set (skill level/Playing skill) [Chat commands for moderators] /Bulletin bulletin the bulletin content type (1:Massive events, 2:System messages range (0):Field 1:Channel 2:World) /Contents of a notification Bulletin notice type (1:Massive events, 2:System messages range (0):Field 1:Channel 2:World) /showswfname (0/1) : swf Name output listens for /showcodename (0/1) : skill, quest, itemThe code namespace, such as output. /Macro penalty : Toggles whether or not the macro penalty action.
